name: C.E.C.S.
description:
[...]

With great effort, we managed to organize the defense and repel their attack. However, this was only the first of many battles. Our mission is to manage the energy that fuels the battered defenses of the city to hold out until our reinforcements arrive.

[...]

Try to resist the alien invasion for thirty days in this post-apocalyptic power management game. 

---DISCLAIMER---

Game is broken, but you can still download it to looks how game feels.

We regret you if it's not what you expected, we will fix all the changes we have pending to upload it as soon as possible.
